scripts.format: find src test \( -name node_modules -o -name bower_components -o -name bower_cache \) -prune -o -name '*.ts' -print | xargs clang-format --style=file -i
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c && node scripts/gen-global-typings.js && gen-typescript-declarations --outDir=.
scripts.test:setup: npm run build && cd test/integration && npm install --no-package-lock && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && cd test/integration && npm test
scripts.test:fast: tsc && rollup -c && node scripts/gen-global-typings.js && cp polymer-decorators.js test/integration/bower_components/polymer-decorators/ && cd test/integration && $(npm bin)/tsc && $(npm bin)/wct -l chrome
